alert.note: Alert for Bleckley (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 25 at 9:22PM EDT until June 26 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN LAURENS...DODGE...PULASKI...NORTHWESTERN WILCOX... DOOLY...SOUTHWESTERN BLECKLEY AND NORTHERN CRISP COUNTIES... At 921 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lowery to near Gresston to near Pinehurst, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Cordele, Eastman, Hawkinsville, Vienna, Unadilla, Chester, Dexter, Byromville, Cadwell, Pineview, Pinehurst, Chauncey, Rentz, Lilly, Dooling, Union, Dubois, Browndale, Plainfield and Richwood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
